TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SecurityElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用于对安全对象进行编码的 XML 对象模型。

span.span: Represents the XML object model for encoding security objects.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类旨在作为在安全系统中使用的简单 XML 对象模型的轻型实现, 而不是用作常规 XML 对象模型。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the security system, and not for use as a general XML object model. 本文档假定你具有 XML 的基本知识。This documentation assumes a basic knowledge of XML. 元素的简单 XML 对象模型由以下部分组成:The simple XML object model for an element consists of the following parts: - 标记为元素名称。The tag is the element name. - 属性在元素上为零个或多个名称/值属性对。The attributes are zero or more name/value attribute pairs on the element. - 子级是在和`` ``中嵌套的零个或多个元素。The children are zero or more elements nested within `` and ``. 强烈建议使用基于属性的 XML 表示形式来表示安全元素及其值。It is strongly suggested that attribute based XML representation is used to express security elements and their values. 这意味着元素的属性表示为属性, 属性值表示为属性值。This means properties of an element are expressed as attributes and property values are expressed as attribute values. 避免在标记内嵌套文本。Avoid nesting text within tags. 对于任何`text`表示形式, 类型``的表示形式通常都可用。For any `text` representation a representation of type `` is usually available. 使用基于属性的 XML 表示形式可提高可读性, 并使生成的 XML 序列化的 WMI 可移植性更强。Using this attribute-based XML representation increases readability and allows easy WMI portability of the resulting XML serialization. 特性名称必须是一个或更长的字符, 并且不`null`能为。An attribute name must be one character or longer, and cannot be `null`. 如果使用基于元素的值表示形式, 则具有`null`文本字符串的元素以``形式表示; 否则, ``文本由和``标记分隔。If element-based value representation is used, elements with a text string that is `null` are represented in the `` form; otherwise, text is delimited by the `` and `` tokens. 这两种形式均可与属性组合在一起, 如果存在, 将显示这些属性。Both forms can be combined with attributes, which are shown if present. 元素的标记、属性和文本 (如果存在) 始终区分大小写。The tags, attributes, and text of elements, if present, are always case-sensitive. XML 窗体在必要时包含引号和转义。The XML form contains quotations and escapes where necessary. 包含无效字符的字符串值, 用于在 XML 中生成。String values that include characters invalid for use in XML result in an . 这些规则适用于所有属性和方法。These rules apply to all properties and methods. > [!NOTE] > 出于性能方面的原因, 仅当元素被编码为 XML 文本格式, 而不是在每个属性或方法集上时, 才会检查字符有效性。For performance reasons, character validity is only checked when the element is encoded into XML text form, and not on every set of a property or method. 静态方法允许在必要时进行明确检查。Static methods allow explicit checking where needed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类的成员。The following example shows the use of members of the class. [!code-cpp[SecurityElementMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CPP/SecurityElementMembers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SecurityElementMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CS/securityelementmembers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SecurityElementMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

The value of the attribute.

summary.span: 将名称/值特性添加到 XML 元素。

span.span: Adds a name/value attribute to an XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特性中的名称和值只能包含有效的 XML 特性字符。Names and values in attributes should only contain valid XML attribute characters. XML 特性名称必须是唯一的。XML attribute names must be unique. 用于从字符串中删除无效字符。Use to remove invalid characters from the string. 不支持带引号的字符串, 因此, 名称/值对的字符串不应包含引号或其他需要引用的字符。There is no support for quoted strings, so strings for name/value pairs should not contain quotes or other characters requiring quoting. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法将名称/值特性添加到 XML 元素。The following code shows the use of the method to add a name/value attribute to an XML element. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 以名称/值对形式获取或设置 XML 元素特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes of an XML element as name/value pairs.

value.span: XML 元素特性值的 对象。

span.span: The object for the attribute values of the XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个属性都作为名称/值对存储在中。Each attribute is stored in the as a name/value pair. 特性中的名称和值应该只包含有效的 XML 特性字符。Names and values in attributes should contain only valid XML attribute characters. 用于从字符串中删除无效字符。Use to remove invalid characters from the string. 不支持带引号的字符串, 因此, 名称/值对的字符串不应包含引号或其他需要引用的字符。There is no support for quoted strings, so strings for name/value pairs should not contain quotes or other characters requiring quoting. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用属性来获取 XML 元素的属性。The following code shows the use of the property to get an attribute of an XML element. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有子元素, 则比较会以递归方式扩展到它们。If there are child elements, comparison extends recursively to them. 不支持对相同字符的不同 XML 表示形式进行比较。There is no support for comparing different XML representations of the same characters. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法来比较两个 XML 元素。The following code shows the use of the method to compare two XML elements. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Escape(string str) cil managed
Public Shared Function Escape (str As String) As String

param.name: str
param.span: 要对其中的无效字符进行转义的字符串。

span.span: The string within which to escape invalid characters.

summary.span: 将字符串中的无效 XML 字符替换为与其等效的有效 XML 字符。

span.span: Replaces invalid XML characters in a string with their valid XML equivalent.

returns.span: 包含无效字符的输入字符串被替换。

span.span: The input string with invalid characters replaced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法在中使用字符串之前, 替换字符串中的无效字符。Use this method to replace invalid characters in a string before using the string in a . 如果在中使用了无效的字符而未进行转义 , 则会引发。If invalid characters are used in a without being escaped, an is thrown. 下表显示了无效的 XML 字符及其转义等效项。The following table shows the invalid XML characters and their escaped equivalents. | 无效的 XML 字符Invalid XML character | 替换为Replaced with | |-----------------------|---------------| | `<` | `<` | | `>` | `>` | | `"` | `"` | | `'` | `'` | | `&` | `&` | ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法将字符串中的无效 xml 字符替换为其有效的 xml 等效项。The following code shows the use of the method to replace invalid XML characters in a string with their valid XML equivalent. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[SecurityElementMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CPP/SecurityElementMembers.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[SecurityElementMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/CS/securityelementmembers.cs#19)] [!code-vb[SecurityElementMembers#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecurityElementMembers/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.SecurityElement FromString(string xml) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromString (xml As String) As SecurityElement

param.name: xml
param.span: 从其创建安全元素的 XML 编码的字符串。

span.span: The XML-encoded string from which to create the security element.

summary.span: 从 XML 编码的字符串创建安全元素。

span.span: Creates a security element from an XML-encoded string.
A created from the XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XML 字符串中不使用单引号;而应使用转义双引号。Do not use single quotation marks in the XML string; instead, use escaped double quotation marks. 例如, 而不是 "`Microsoft"`使用"`Microsoft"`。For example, instead of "`Microsoft"` use "`Microsoft"`. 使用单引号会导致引发异常, 或者在某些情况下, 在字符串中将单引号视为文本。Using single quotation marks can result in either an exception being thrown or, in some cases, the single quotation marks being treated as text in the string.

exception.span: 包含一个或多个单引号字符。

span.span: contains one or more single quotation mark characters.
is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于以下内容:This method is equivalent to the following: [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecurityElement#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.securityelement/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityElement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.securityelement/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityElement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.securityelement/vb/remarks.vb#1)] 对于如下所示的`SearchForTextOfTag("second")` XML, 将返回 "文本 2"。With XML as follows, `SearchForTextOfTag("second")` would return "text2". ``` text1 text2 ``` ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法通过其标记名称查找子级并返回包含的文本。The following code shows the use of the method to find a child by its tag name and return the contained text. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. The tag name of an XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XML 中, 标记显示在脚本中, 如下所示:In XML, the tag appears in the script as appears below: ``` text ``` 如果此元素包含子元素, 则子级将替换`text`。If this element has child elements, the children will replace `text`. 仅将有效的 XML 标记字符串分配给此属性。Assign only valid XML tag strings to this property. 用于从字符串中删除无效字符。Use to remove invalid characters from the string. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用属性来获取 XML 元素的标记名称。The following code shows the use of the property to get the tag name of an XML element. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
